title: Mobile-Based Educational Material Development Strategies for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Long-term course aimed at enhancing professional competencies for professionals in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design educational materials by applying the four-stage instructional techniques (metaphor, image, model, proposition)
Learners can select knowledge representation strategies optimized for mobile environments (text/image/interactive elements)
Learners can develop and evaluate effective microlearning content in limited technological environments (smartphones)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
